Uses of Package
github.lightningcreations.lcjei

  • Packages that use github.lightningcreations.lcjei 
    Package Description
    github.lightningcreations.lcjei
    Base Package for Lightning Creations Java Engine Interface.
    github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper
    Package for wrapping games from multiple engines into another.
  • Classes in github.lightningcreations.lcjei used by github.lightningcreations.lcjei 
    Class and Description
    IEngineInterface
    Class Representing an Interface to a Game Engine that runs games of a specified type.
    Provided a way to access this Interface is the minimum requirements for Compliance with the Lightning Creations Java Game Interface Specification.
    This Interface makes it possible for game engines to delegate to other game engines, wrap games from other engines, or even embed games from other engines to other games.
    All Methods are allowed to check an unspecified permission with the System or some other unspecified Security Manager.
    IGameInfo
    Class that represents information about a Game.
  • Classes in github.lightningcreations.lcjei used by github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper 
    Class and Description
    IEngineInterface
    Class Representing an Interface to a Game Engine that runs games of a specified type.
    Provided a way to access this Interface is the minimum requirements for Compliance with the Lightning Creations Java Game Interface Specification.
    This Interface makes it possible for game engines to delegate to other game engines, wrap games from other engines, or even embed games from other engines to other games.
    All Methods are allowed to check an unspecified permission with the System or some other unspecified Security Manager.
